title: Cross-section of the Earth
description: An illustration showing a cross-section of the Earth, revealing its internal layers. The outer layer is the crust, followed by the mantle, outer core, and inner core, with the inner core depicted in bright yellow.

title: Earth from Space
description: A realistic depiction of Earth as seen from space, showcasing the continents, oceans, and cloud formations. The image highlights the vibrant greens of the land and the deep blues of the oceans, with a clear view of Africa prominently featured.
